pkgmetadata.longdescription: TEMPO (Topographic Eeg Mapping Program) is software for 3D visualization of brain electrical activity. TEMPO is able to read EEG recordings in standard EDF format and to create animated sequence of 3D topographic maps with EEG activity color-coded over scalp region. The primary strength of TEMPO approach to topographic mapping is ability to examine the same map from different viewpoints - user is able to navigate around head object using mouse. Individual topographic maps could be saved in PNG format for future examination. The animation, as well as mapping parameters, are controllable through corresponding graphical user interface.
